We take a lot of grief for it, but we're like the quick draw artists of the duelling world. 'Thaumatomachy,' to use the technical term for a duel, which no one but professors does."

"I'm not sure that's properly conjug . . . " Gin Fizz begins to say before being cut off by a disbelieving Too-Blonde.

"So your mission in life is to become the John Wesley Hardin of magical tickling?!" she says, jaw dropping.

"Well . . . sort of," you say, in truth not totally familiar with the name. "Duelling's just a part of it. A lot of tickle sorcerors wind up going into neuroscience, psychobiology, stuff like that."

"Stand-up comedy," Conker suggests.

"Child care!" says Shockwave, and by now all six are giggling at your expense. You don't mind. They're q-girls, so they don't know who's going to have the last laugh.

As you're thinking this, you hear what sounds like three dozen cheerleaders bursting into laughter somewhere not too far away. Becky must have nailed them pretty hard, and the sound of it piques you into action.

You've been working on something that proved not terribly effective against other sorcerors, but it might be OK against quotes. You start in with a magical phrase that runs to something more like a verse, too long to get off quickly. The Merediths stand and wait patiently, maybe a little eagerly.

Too-Blonde tops your list, since she seems like the snarkiest of the six girls, so you target her without a second thought. She sighs and shifts from foot to foot, trying to resist giggling, and finally can't help it. Too-Blonde drops with a squeal of laughter, trying to toe off her shoes and drag her socks free as the latter fill up with tickling filaments. You'd taken pride in this one, the hardest part being the phrasing that lets you summon the tiny threads of energy into someone's clothing before said threads undergo magical deposition to fluffy materiality, tickling as they expand. Naturally, any of the girls you'd tried it on (first Kelly, and then Laura when your ego was already bruised) had been able to counter it without effort, and you were never able to shorten the phrase to a more serviceable terseness.

Too-Blonde is your first successful victim, rolling around while kicking and screeching, the rest of her group more than happy to tease her. She'd gotten the shoes off but then lost any ability to deal with her socks, which are double-rolled at mid-shin in some cheerleader method that must help to keep them up during drills. The white socks are undulating as noodles of orange fuzz squitter out of them, looking like fugitive caterpillars sick of being cocooned. The effect ends too quickly for your liking, though Too-Blonde is glad of it. If she'd been able to get her socks off, that would have ended the fun at once; the spell is only effective against skin locked in tight clothing, useless against someone who's already barefoot. Also, for stylistic reasons, it bugs you that you were never able to get any other color but orange.

"What do you call that spell?" Too-Blonde asks, peeling her socks off with some interest as she has a closer look at the orange stuff. Fortunately, her teammates are equally interested in the feel and texture of the fluff, not driven to immediately bare their feet to avoid Too-Blonde's experience. Although if the original Meredith spent a full day with Becky, she must like being tickled, so her clones might feel the same.

"The Dreadful Orange Fuzzies," you tell Too-Blonde, shrugging as she laughs at you. "Something I came up with myself, just a placeholder name. It doesn't work against other sorcerors, believe me. A failed experiment."

"Failed?!" the other girls say as one, surprised. They're under the impression it was middling cool, but then they're still quotes even if they're clones.

"Oh, good, I thought this would be disgusting," Too-Blonde says to herself, eyes on her feet as she steps around on the shroomy turf.

"Mushrooms are a fungus, so you can get athlete's foot from them," Shockwave says with a ring of authority in her voice.

"Are you for real?" Gin Fizz asks, mirroring Too-Blonde's earlier jaw drop. Yet another interesting divergence between the Merediths.

You consider your next move.
113222111121212.title: Beautiful, but no Staminas

1133.content:
you were always a good person, so even this time you choose to do the right thing and start to approach Laura, she is looking at you with a bit of fear on her eyes.

she is really surprised when you start to say the words to free her and start to stand up on her feet

''you can go now! I fill forgive you for spying me this time!' you say peacefully.

The face of Laura turn first relaxed because she avoided some little torture and then red because she feel humiliated by such mercy of you, you walk toward the door to open it giving your back to Laura..... A big mistake! Suddenly your arms are lifted in the air , tied to the upper part of the door. Laura evil laugh go trough the room.

''you are always too good! this is always your weakness, because that you can't defeat me!'' she approaches you starting to run slowly her fingers on your armpits. The sensation its horrible even if its just the start, and you begin to sweat

''oh no please dont tickle me i was gentle to you!'' you beg to her

''well it was your mistake now you must face the consequences of your actions!!''

she...
1133.title: let her go

choices: Laura casts an insidious spell from the book
You manage to save yourself with a simple cantrip ... somehow
11331.content:
Laura digs mercilessly into your armpits and you flop and spasm helplessly against the door, exploding in a fit of screaming laughter!

"Never turn your back on your opponent, dummy!" Laura chides, happily spidering her agile fingers up and down your sides.

"Please Laura!" you squeal breathlessly, "Agghh-haha-ha-ha-ha! This isn't-ah-haha-haha-ha-ha! Fair!" You try to twist your body away from Laura's devilish fingers, but it's hopeless, the magic is holding you tightly.

It quickly becomes obvious that Laura is ignoring your pleading, lost in a joyous frenzy of tickle torture, and after a while you aren't able to say anything comprehensible anyway.

The tickling goes and on and on without a break for what seems like ever! You're just able to gulp enough air between fits of laughter to stay conscious but you wonder if the alternative wouldn't be preferable.

Breathless and sweaty, you suddenly realize the torture has stopped. You notice Laura is breathing pretty heavily as well, and wiping a damp strand of hair from her forehead.

"There," you manage weakly, "I learned my lesson Laura! Now it's late, please let me go."

"Yeah," Laura sighs, "my hands are starting to cramp up!" She smiles, and begins backing away from you. "I wish I could tickle you all night long, but it's just too exhausting. There's no way I could do it. But, maybe something in this book can!"

Your stomach goes cold as Laura quickly snaps the grimoire up from your desk and scans the index of spells!

"You're evil Laura!" You shout, mustering what little strength you have to struggle against your magical shackles.

"Ah! Here's something!" Laura says, smiling maniacally and jabbing at the page with a finger.

Any more tickling might drive you insane, but there aren't too many spells you can defend yourself with without your hands free and how long does the spell pinning you to the door last anyway?!
11331.title: tickle your armpits

choices: Try to untie yourself and get to class
113311.content:
Laura finishes an incantation and all is momentarily silent. You begin to think perhaps the spell failed, but a sudden creaking under your bed fills you with unease.

You crane your neck, looking over your shoulder at your bed and see a swarm of miniature humanoids pouring forth, garbed in drab apparel, their greenish faces twisted into permanent masks of mischief: imps!

You struggle pointlessly as you recall all you've heard about the tiny monsters; their appetite for trouble-making is insatiable whether it be tripping people up, or stealing small items, or - your eyes go wide with terror - tickling humans for their tears of laughter!

The monsters spread over your room, grabbing up laces from your shoes, neckties, long socks; you watch terrified and slightly confused.

Unexpectedly, to you anyway, the magic pinning you to the door relents and you drop to the floor with a thud, stunning you for fractions of a second, but that's all the time the imps need.

Laura squeals with delight, clapping her hands together as the creatures nimbly wash over you in a blur of coiling laces and silk!

"Laura please, not this!" You beg, feeling the imps drawing your feet up into a stringent hogtie. "These things will be at it all night, I'll never survive!"

"Oh stop that, you baby," Laura says, pouting. "Imps have never tickled anyone to death ... that I'm aware of at least."

"But you already tickled me, you won! I learned my lesson, okay!" You become desperate as one of the imps on your back begins sliding one of your school ties down your face. "Laura! Laura! Wait, I prmmMMmppphhh! Nrmmma!"

Laura chuckles as the imp tugs the tie between your teeth and knots it tightly in place.

"I'm sorry Kevin, I have no idea what you're saying." She teases. "Any way I need to get to bed. It's late and we both have to be up for Elemental Magics class early in the morning."

You groan at the thought of having to tackle EM, one of the hardest classes you have, with one of the sternest professors, after spending an entire night tickle tortured by imps!

"Well, I'll see you then!" Laura chirps, bounding happily out of your dorm and closing the door behind you.

You struggle and strain hard, but the imps' restraints are unyielding! You feel several of the monsters weaving strings around your feet and toes, tying them into total immobility, which tickles something fierce in itself, eliciting wild, muffled laughter that only seems to drive the imps into a mirthful frenzy!

Then the monsters begin in earnest: scores of agile little fingers savagely tickling the soles of your feet! You scream with laughter, and squirm feebly (as there's literally nothing else you can do), as the imps concentrate everything they have on your feet, whooping and hollering in a chorus of tiny voices. As your eyes fill with tears, an imp near your face daubs them with a small cloth, wringing it out into a little flask with a grin.

This goes on for what seems like eternity, you laugh until you are hoarse and the room spins deliriously around you. The imps give you breaks every 20 minutes or so, but other than that, they tickle your feet all night long, filling several of their flasks with your tears.

But as the first light of dawn streams in through your window, the horrid little things relent for good, slapping you on the backside and thighs one-by-one, as they retreat back under the bed, returning to their own plane.

But the little fiends don't bother to untie you! You're totally exhausted, after an entire night of sleepless tickling, and still soundly hogtied and class is about to start! You'll catch hell for being late, or missing class altogether, but you're so tired you almost don't even care at the moment.

Somehow you manage to loosen one of the knots binding your wrists after several determined minutes; if you work at it, you could be untied in under a half hour, you think. You'll be late for class, sure, but you may not miss it entirely!
113311.title: Laura casts an insidious spell from the book

choices: Practice with Becky in the Solarium
1133112.content:
You manage to work another knot loose and tug at your bondage, but it doesn't budge at all! There must be knots upon knots upon knots back there. You sigh heavily through your nose and drift quickly off to sleep.

Knocking at your door jars you awake, and you shift about achingly in your hogtie. You're rested, but not comfortably! Your whole body is stiff, and your face and tie-gag are soaked with drool, but somehow your limbs haven't fallen asleep. Those imps must really know their knots.

You hear the door open behind you followed by a short gasp and a familiar voice.

"Oh my gosh Kevin! Have you been here all morning?"

It's Becky, one of your cute and infinitely more humane classmates. You struggle vigorously and tell her to untie you, but the gag turns it all to nonsense.

Becky closes the door behind her and rushes over, loosening your gag and pulling it out of your mouth. You work your sore jaw and try to spit away some of the accumulated saliva.

"Laura, I bet." says Becky, starting to undo the knots on your feet and toes. "That explains why she had an even more evil grin than usual all through Elemental Magics this morning."

"Ugh! I've been here since before lights out!" You groan. "And there were imps!"

Becky shudders. "Your feet are bright red! They must have tickled you non-stop!"

"What a demon Laura is," Becky says, undoing your hogtie and working at your wrist bondage. "Someone really needs to teach her a lesson!"

"I know," you say. "But she's so good at magic. I'll never be able to beat her, especially if I keep missing classes!"

"Eeeecch," says Becky.

"Was Professor Ualn mad?" You ask, wincing.

"He said a mage that favors sleeping late over studying will never amount to anything."

You curse.

"And he said you'll probably fail the test this Thursday, we covered a lot of defensive stuff today."

"Ack! The Earth Control exam! I can't fail that! I'll have to take it twice!" You moan.

Free of the ad-hoc impish bondage, you rub at your joints and stretch your back.

"What time is it?" You ask.

"Free period, for the next half hour or so." Says Becky. "If you wanted, I could show you some of the stuff we learned today down in the East Solarium."

You cringe slightly, Becky is nice and everything, but she's an even more inept spell-caster than you are. Still, the test is in a few days, and second-hand lessons from Becky are probably better than no lessons at all.

Of course, you might be able to explain things to Professor Ualn and maybe beg him to give you some quick tutoring. But the professor doesn't have the kindest reputation.

After some quick thinking you decide to ...
1133112.title: Give in to sleep

choices: Laura tries another spell to gain the upper hand
11332.content:
Having magically bound me, Laura quickly put into play a minor distraction spell in the form of tiny, invisible, tireless fingers, one over each of my nips. The gentle rubbing action felt REALLY GOOD, and I only just managed to finish summoning some quick reinforcements in the form of the bugbears who hide in the walls of this area of the student housing.

         Laura was still grinning at me, arms helplessly caught high over my head, incapable of hiding the immensely nice feeling of the fingers tweaking my nipples, deciding her next move, when she feels sudden tuggings on her legs and one of her arms. The bugbears were in their small forms, and had lashed out at the intruding student from another area of the school with a vengeance. Utilizing some sort of magical silly-string-like substance, they were firing small musket-styled devices at Laura, trying to trap her limbs. Then, one brazenly rappelled onto Lauraâs back from a shadowy bookshelf!

         âOh, very funny! I should have expected something as hopeless as bugbears from you! You know you canât bring your little roomies to the tournament, dillweed!â, Laura growls at me, now stuck fighting off my âcavalryâ, so to speak.

         âWell, you shouldnât have just blindly launched an attack like that, right in my own room!â, I replied, âEspecially right after Iâd given you a free-pass.â

         Now with two small fuzzy-fingered attackers clinging to her, Laura shot back, âYouâre going to have to be prepared for anything during the tournament, dingus! I say we both call off our charms and weâll call it a draw. Deal?â

         I had almost freed my wrists with a simple unbinding spell, but decided to give her another chance, âDeal! But you go first!â, I snapped back.
11332.title: Dorm Mates to the Rescue

choices: Attend a spellcasting focus group in the library
113322.content:
âYou first, Laura!â, I declare, smiling as I watch Laura trying to maintain her footing while sticky strands of stringy stuff affixed to her ankles by the bugbears keep pulling her legs apart, widening her stance.

         âFine!â Says Laura, âWeâll save it for the tournament, then.â, she seems to agree with me as she then starts to mumble a spell. I assumed it was one merely to reverse the effects of my current state, but instead, I suddenly feel the back of my shorts being hoisted up! Iâm being wedgied by invisible hands that have grasped the back of my underwear!

         âYee-ouch! Oh, very funny, Laura!â, I snarl, âOnly YOU would go looking for a spell to give someone a wedgie! Oww! Whoa! Ease-up a tad!â

         Laura is laughing at me, and I am furious at her, causing all this right in my dorm room! She has me pretty badly, Iâm afraid, and she can sense it, when suddenly - the bugbears inadvertently come to my rescue, scampering up her legs, and ruining her concentration on the three separate spells sheâs woven.

         Laura screams and kicks first one and then the other leg, trying to remove my furry little pals who cling like happy little garters round her smooth thighs. She turns and dances away, still trying to free the grip of the fuzzy bugbears.

         Laura does manage to remove the bugbears, and they come rolling like little furry balls back into my room and under the bed, while she is still hurling insults outside my door, and telling me sheâs going to mop the floor with me at the spell tournament.

         Yeesh.

         I sigh, and do secretly worry that Iâll be made a total laughing-stock in front of the half the student body at the tournament. If not by Laura (who I equal in spells memorized on a good day), then by some other rival whoâll reduce me to nervous jelly with tickling spells at my weakest spots! I know that, deep down, almost any enchantress using the right combination of spells, could easily gain the upper hand on me. So, rather than concentrate on offensive spells to bother opponent spell-casters, Iâve had to bone up on defensive spells to bend back feathers and zap magic tickling fingers.

         I study some more, eat a late dinner, and turn in for the night, filled with dread and uncertainty at my ability to master tickle-magic when I am so horribly susceptible to it!

         When I awaken later, it feels like next morning, but it also has a strangely surreal, dreamy sense to the day, and I wonder if I am not still under a magic spell or still asleep as I lay against my pillow.
113322.title: Laura cannot be trusted!

12.content:
You decide you've studied enough and are ready to compete in the tournament, although.... you've thought that before and you've always wound up begging and pleading to submit! But this time, you feel it will be different.

You get to the arena, it's literally a wrestling ring, the ropes enclosing the legal combat area. You see three of the girls that you will compete against.

Laura, your arch nemesis, she always seems to be one step ahead of you in tickle magic and she loves it! She never shows you ANY mercy and seems to LOVE torturing you and making you beg and say humiliating things, you'd LOVE to get some revenge!

Becky, she's the shy one of the bunch, she's always been nice to you, she tries her best but, in matches she often winds up with a spell backfiring on her and laughing and begging her OPPONENT to save her! Might be an easy win!

Kelly, She's very adept at tickle magic, more so than any of the others, she doesn't have the sadistic side of Laura (thankfully!) but she's by far the most gifted of all the students. Hey, if you lose at least she won't torture you and make you beg (probably)

By rule, all contestants must start out wearing shorts, a shirt, and socks. This is to practice removal of clothing that might protect weak spots.

who will you challenge?
12.title: Go to the tournament

choices: Dispel the ring and defeat Laura without magic!
121.content:
The temptation to get revenge on Laura is overwhelming, you just can't resist! Confidently, you challenge her to a match.

The two of you step into opposite corners of the ring. Laura stares evilly at you with her dark, insidious eyes. You've been studying quite a lot since your last encounter and in your studies you've uncovered what seems to be a pretty amazing total immobilization spell! The verbal components are tricky and it takes a while to cast, but you're certain you can pull it off.

A tone chimes and the match officially begins. Before Laura can act, you rattle off your amazing new spell with incredible speed and precision! Laura's eyes go wide as yards of spectral rope blink into existence and begin wrapping themselves around her body.

"Where the heck did you learn this?!?!" Laura shouts, just as coils of rope slide between her teeth, effectively gagging her. This IS an awesome spell!

In a few seconds, Laura is completely covered in shimmering rope. Only the top of her head and her feet protrude from the countless coils that bind her. She struggles and MMPHs fecklessly as you walk triumphantly toward her.

"That, Laura," you tease, "is a dusty old immobilization spell. I don't think they even teach it anymore, but I don't know why. It seems to be pretty effective!"

Laura shakes her head and grunts angrily as you kneel down in front of her wriggling feet. Slowly, maliciously, you pull her socks off, exposing her bare, sensitive soles and meticulously pedicured toes.

"I've waited so long for this Laura, to pay you back." you whisper. "And since the match is only over once you verbally submit - and you can't exactly do that in your present situation - I think I'm going to tickle your feet until you pass out. Or until my hands cramp up or I get bored, whichever happens first."

You smile and Laura's eyes bulge as she screams and twists in the coils of rope that hold her fast.

You're about to rake your nails over her vainly kicking feet when Laura begins to shimmer and sputter, slowly becoming translucent!

You are momentarily stunned as coils of shimmering rope appear and wrap themselves around your body, leaving you helplessly gagged and bound, just as Laura was! The image of Laura in front of you smiles and disappears completely and you hear Laura's voice from behind you.

"Congratulations on immobilizing my mirror image, you dunce."

You fall to the mat and desperately roll onto your back. You see Laura walking maliciously toward you.

"And they don't teach that immobilization spell anymore because it only works when your target isn't paying any attention."

You begin pleading desperately into your gag as Laura kneels down in front of your feet and begins slowly rolling your socks off.

"So how long were you going to tickle me?" Laura asks, mockingly. "Until I passed out, or until you got bored? Was that it?"

You shake your head and struggle uselessly while Laura holds your now naked feet in an iron grip.

"Well, I never get bored of torturing you. Let's see how long you can remain conscious then?"

With frenzied speed Laura attacks your feet with her nails, dragging them over your soles and between your desperately wriggling toes. You scream and struggle until your head swims and your vision blurs.

After what seems like an eternity of tickling you feel the coils of magical rope beginning to loosen on your body. In a daze, you glance up and see Laura, now standing directly over you, beginning to cast another, probably even more terrible spell! Thinking as quickly as you're capable of, you realize you can cast a Dispel, nullifying all magic within the ring and relying on your physical strength along to best Laura, or you can cast that other, incredibly cruel and amazing spell you've recently been studying. You're fairly certain you kind of remember the words ...
121.title: Laura

choices: She waits for you to cast and tries a counter spell
122.content:
You decide to go for the easy win. Becky is a lovely brunette with light olive skin, skinny, with smaller but nicely formed breasts. There is a cute uncertainty about her that you find appealing. She seems nervous, she never did have much confidence. She steps into the ring, as do you. The referee signals the match begun, and the two of you lock eyes, waiting for the other to utter a magical phrase.

What happens?
122.title: Becky

choices: Becky finishes her spell and it works!
Attempt to stop Becky's casting with a Magical Gag spell
1221.content:
You begin to cast Fraudello's Immobilizing Ball.

Becky get's a late start. It sounds like she;s trying to cast a simple antimagic barrier, but she keeps stuttering over the middle syllables.

You finish your spell eloquently and Becky is magically doubled over: she drops to the mat, stretching her arms out so her wrists are even ankles and tucking her legs up so her knees touch her collar. She topples over, exposing her bare feet and round ass. Her face flushes with embarrassment. Her glossy bubble-gum pink toe-nails shimmer in the arena lights as she desperately clenches her feet.

You almost feel bad as you haughtily approach your bested opponent.

Her eyes go wide with fear as she continues to attempt to cast some spell, mumbling and botching the phrasing horribly.

"Becky, just submit," you say.

She continues her feeble "casting", butchering the syllables even more as she rushes to cast.

"Do you want me to cast Aundia's Jawbreaking Lemon Gag?!", you ask, increasingly exasperated. "If you keep on babbling who knows what sort of magical train wreck you'll concoct!"

"Just submit," you whisper loudly. "I won't even tickle you."

Becky stops her blabber-casting for a moment, eyeing you incredulously. She notices you looking at her slim, helpless feet, scoffs and continues trying to cast her spell.

It's likely that Becky will flub whatever spell she's trying to cast, but even if she does it could be unfortunate for both of you. It might be best to magically gag her and go for the referee-determined win.
1221.title: You try to cast first

12211.content:
Becky finally stops stuttering long enough to cast her spell and you see two ghostly hands appear. Your eyes go wide with fear as the hands move towards you and wiggle their fingers menacingly.

"Maybe you should just submit Kevin!" Becky shouts triumphantly as you slowly retreat.

You nervously stammer out a reversal spell, hoping the hands tickle Becky instead.
12211.title: Becky finishes her spell and it works!

122111.content:
The ghost hands suddenly go limp in front of you and you realize they're waiting for a command. Becky is still stuck on the floor tucked in a forced fetal position from her earlier botched spell, and as you look down at her you consider your options. Becky's feet and sides are both very vulnerable in her current position. You decide to fish for some information first, maybe she'll even give her weak spot by accident.

"Well Becky, where should I tickle you first? Maybe your sides?" Becky narrows her eyes and tries to look menacing "I'm not giving up yet" she starts mumbling another spell under her breath, it sounds like she's trying to free herself by cancelling her first spell. You notice her toes are tightly clenched and you get an idea.

"How about your feet, the way you're already clenching your toes makes me think they're very ticklish!" Becky's eyes go wide for just a second and she looks away from you hoping you didn't see the fear in her eyes. "Just give up now Becky and won't even tickle you" She doesn't respond, still trying to free herself.

"Okay, you had you're chance Becky." You tell the ghost hands to tickle Becky's feet. The hands spider along Becky's socked soles causing her to burst into giggles. "Give up yet Becky?"

"Nohohohehehehe!" Becky giggles as she wiggles her feet helplessly. You walk over to Becky and remove her socks, then step back and let the ghost hands go to work.

"heheheheHAHAHAhehehe!" Becky's giggles are now joined by bursts of hard laughter when the ghost hands brush over a very ticklish spot in the center of her soles. You kneel down and hold back Becky's toes she can't move her feet at all.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Becky laughs between fits of silent laughter as she struggles to breathe while the ghost hands focus on the weak spot in the center of her soles. "STHAHAHAHAHAP!" Becky begs you. "Say I submit" you tell her. "IHAHAHAHASUHAHAHA!" is all she can manage to get out before she goes in and out of silent laughter. You tell the ghost hands to stop tickling so Becky can catch her breath. "Say it!" you tell Becky. She lies on the floor silent and you tell the ghost hands to give her feet a quick tickle. OkayheheheIHAHAHAhehehesubmihihihitHAHAHAHA!" she trails
off into silent laughter before the ghost hands stop tickling her feet. You dispel the ghost hands and release Becky from her first spell. What do you do next?
122111.title: Your spell works!

122112.content:
You finish what was supposed to be a reversal spell, but to your shock and horror, you multiplied the hands instead! There are now four ghostly hands coming straight for you. "Give up now and I'll call them off Kevin!" Becky shouts, taunting you. You're not going to give up that easily, Becky is still trapped in a fetal position on the floor, maybe you can tickle her in to submission before the hands get to you. You dive between the hands and land next to Becky on the floor. You immediately start tickling Becky's vulnerable sides, as the four hands idle above you.

"Why hehehehe aren't hehehehe they hehehehe moving?" Becky asks between giggles."You really should study more" you say as kneel at Becky's socked feet. As you remove Becky's socks, you wish you hadn't said anything.

She shouts "Tickle Kevin!" and all four hands rush at you. Two of the hands are tickling your neck while the other two are going for your sides and belly. You giggle and squirm trying to bat the hands away until you fall over. You're so busy you don't notice Becky free herself from her original spell and get up off the mat.

"Hold him down!" Becky commands the ghost hands as they grab your wrists and ankles, holding you spread eagle, face up on the mat.
"Last chance to give up Kevin" Becky says as she wiggles her fingers in front of you. You don't respond, trying to think of a spell that will get you out of this mess. Your thoughts are interrupted as Becky kneels down next to you and starts slowly tickling your armpits. You try to hold in your laughter, but as her fingers work her way down your sides you start to giggle. "Where'd your tickle spot Kevin?" Becky teases. "Not hehehe telling hehehe you." you say between giggles. Becky smiles and says "Oh, but you just told me you do have at least one, and I'm not stopping until i find it!"

Becky's fingers work they way around your sides and land just below your navel. You laugh a bit harder and Becky picks up on it as she speeds up her tickling pace, sending you into helpless laughter. "Tickle tickle tickle, is this your tickle spot Kevin?" Becky continues to tease you. "NOHOHOHOHOHAHAHAHA!" you laugh, not wanting to give up yet. Truthfully this is one of your most ticklish spots and Laura has used it to make you submit on several occasions, but Becky's not the expert tickle Laura is. Becky tickles all over your belly until your out of breath.

"Your tougher than you look Kevin, but I think I've been going at this all wrong. I noticed my ghost friends here never tickled your feet" Becky says as she kneels down next to your feet. "Becky don't!" you shout,knowing the game is up. "Submit!" Becky shouts back. "NHAHAHAHAHAHA!" your reply is cut off as Becky spiders her fingers all over your helpless soles. "Tell me Kevin, which foot's more ticklish? The right?" she asks, using all ten fingers to tickle every part of your right foot. "NHOHOHOHOHAHAHA!" you laugh. She stops tickling you for a second and asks "did you know you've got a birthmark on the bottom of your left foot?" Your feet have always been your most ticklish spot, especially your left foot. Laura likes to call the birthmark in the middle of your left sole your "tickle button". "Becky dohohohon't" you giggle as she pokes at it. "Looks like I finally found your tickle spot Kevin!" Becky shouts triumphantly as she uses all ten fingers to tickle your left foot, making sure at least one finger is always tickling your birthmark. "Tickle tickle tickle, kootchy, kootchy coo" Becky's teasing sends you completely over the edge. "IHAHAHASUHAHAHA!" You want to submit, but you can't form the words! Becky stops tickling you "Tell me I found your tickle spot, tell me you submit!" You lay there catching your breath until you feel a single finger stroking your left sole. "You hehehe found hehehe it hehehe I hehehe suHAHAbmit!" Becky jumps up in the air and claps her hands, celebrating her victory. "Don't worry Kevin, the ghost hands will dissipate soon, I think. I can wait with you till then if you want." Becky wasn't really a cruel tickler, she just wanted to win the match. Having someone to watch out for you until your free would be nice. On other hand, being the first one to actually loose to Becky is pretty embarrassing, maybe you should send her away?
122112.title: the ghost hands tickle you

1222.content:
She utters a magical phrase, you know exactly what it is, you also know that she completely botched it, and even worse, it was a multiple effects spell! Upon completing the phrase the ring ropes stretch toward her (you know they were supposed to go for you.) You stand there with a look on your face that can only be one of pity. She notices it too late and the ropes trap her in the corner. The top two ropes tie up her arms over her head and the bottom two spread her legs and trap her feet.

"Uuuuh! NO!" She says frantically trying to free her self

You grimace, you actually feel sorry for her because you know what's coming next. The pole holding up the ropes comes to life! and worse yet, it grows four sets of arms! enough to get all of her worse spots!

The final effect is the disappearance of all of her clothes. This is the last straw, she feels the cool air hitting her bare feet, torso and private parts and the combination of humileation and anticipation of the torture is too much. She starts begging you, HER OPPONANT! for help, just as the pole begins its task.

It tickles her pits with one set of hands, ribs and (gasp) nipples with another , the tipple torture makes her yelp which makes you feel even worse for her, It tickles the backs of her knees with another set which makes her bellow in laaughter, and the last set tickles her helpless bare feet.

Having her pits, nipples, ribs, knees AND feet tickled at the same time is too much and she screams out her submission.

You feel SO sorry for her at this point.

"I'm sorry" you say "But you can't submit to your own spell, it was meant for me and only I can submit to it and, well (you rub the back of your neck) I don't"

The pole starts pokiing her feet and her pits and lightly pinching her nipples, driving her crazy. It skitters ten fingers up and down the backs of her knees. It's way more than she can stand.

"ohplease! " she begs "pleasesubmitt!" "uuuuuuhuhuhuhhh! Icantakeit!"

She sounds so desperate. You want to make it stop, but she did get her self in there. This may be a good learning experience for her.

What do you do?
1222.title: She tries to cast first

12221.content:
You can't bear seeing the poor girl suffering anymore. Becky has always been nice to you, in fact she might be the most friendly person at the academy.
Her practical skills may be bad, but more than once she is the reason you passed some of the theoretical exams

If this was any other person, you wouldn't do this....

"Okay I submit", you say still not believing that you just threw away that easy win.

Within an instant the rope, pole and arms all disappear, leaving Becky lying on the floor, completely exhausted.

"Ha, that was completely pathetic".

You look into the direction of the voice and of course it's Laura who said those words.
Apparently her match starts right after yours and she has entered the arena already.

"You call this a match? One fool targeting herself and the other one simply forfeits.
Becky, you are a disgrace for us. You are lucky that idiot was your opponent, I would have let you suffer at your own hands
But maybe he was simply afraid of facing me next? You know I would have destroyed you Kevin hahaha"

As you want to give Laura a proper answer with an angry face, you are interrupted by one of your teachers, Miss Galacia.

"That's enough Laura. You will wait until your match starts", she says, verbally putting Laura into her place.
Then she moves her head in your direction.

"Kevin, mercy is a nice character trait. But it will also hinder your and Beckys progression. There is a reason these tournaments are held and it's not like we wouldn't intervene if something dangerous was going to happen.
Becky, Laura is correct to a certain extent, I also believe you should have faced the consequences of your own magic to remember it. But I guess as things have turned out now, you just will have to remember this lesson on your own. If this was a real battle, you would have been in serious trouble at your own fault. I know that you have great potential, but this is unacceptable. I expect more of you."

Wow that was harsh, you're not even sure if Becky heard the words as she is barely conscious by now,
"Now, you and you, take her to the medical wing."
The two medics, who were addressed by Miss Galacia obey. They give poor Becky some cloth to cover her body, then pick her up and carry her away.

You on the other hand stay and watch the remaining tournament.
Of course Laura wins all her battles, which she simply has to rub in your face at the end of the tournament, just as you are about to leave to your room.

For hours you keep reading that magical book of yours, while also thinking about the events of today. Did you really make the right decision?
It's already pretty late when suddenly someone knocks on your door. Confused about who would interrupt you at this hour you move to the door to open it.
You're quite astonished when you find Becky in front of the door.

"May I enter Kevin?"
"Sure", you answer, still a little bit baffled.
You close the door and ask "Is there something I can do for you?"

"I came here ... to thank you for today"
"You don't have to..."
"Yes I have. Laura was right. It was embarrassing. I was useless, completely overwhelmed and on top of that completely naked, in front of everybody. And it was all my own fault"
"This kid of things happen to everybody once in a while"
"I envy you. Kevin. Even though your magic is not that good, you challenge other opponents again and again. If only I had your confidence"
"Becky, I don't know what to say, you make me feel a little bit embarrassed"

You're holding your neck and having a grin in your face speaking those last words.

"You know, I think Miss Galacia was right. I should face my consequences"
"What?"
"Yes, I have to take my responsibility. But I think I would die if it happened in front of everybody again. This is why I want you to do it."
"Me?"
"Yes, it was our right to tickle me anyways, if you hadn't surrendered to protect me"

You can see her face blushing while speaking out those words. She can't even look into your face anymore.
"Are you sure about this?"
"Please don't talk me out of this. It took a lot of courage to come here", she answers
Becky begins to undress until she's standing in front of you in just her underwear. Then she moves into your bed.

"If my magic wasn't so bad I would do it myself, but instead I brought these"
In her right hand she is holding some shackles. Normally you would throw them at your opponent, but after breaking the seal Becky puts it on her chest.
As soon as the artifact touches her skin, the magic shackles fasten her to the bed in a similar way as she had been tied during the tournament.

"One more thing, Kevin. I know that I can't take this type of punishment very well. I will be begging you to stop immediately. You have to refuse. Don't stop until I learned my lesson"
"That's a little bit vague, don't you think. What does this mean?"
"Just imagine I was a different person that had lost to you. Yes imagine I was Laura. What would you do if she had lost to you and would be completely vulnerable? You would tickle her senseless and you have to do it to me as well. I lost the match, I have to face the consequences"

Becky must be pretty desperate, Miss Galacia's words must have really hurt her if she is going so far
"You are going to regret this, Becky. But if this is really what you want, I will do it. I will tickle you as if you were Laura", you say as you are preparing to tickle Becky ...
12221.title: Help her

122212.content:
"Surely it would be fitting to start with this".

Slowly you say the magic words of a magic spell. Since nobody is going to interrupt you, you take your time to not make any mistake.

"Do you recognize it?"
Becky swallows as she knows exactly what this is. It's a variation of the spell she tried to use on you in the tournament, just without the restriction part.

As soon as you are finished saying the words, the bed grows 4 sets of arms.
Two arms immediately start tickling Becky's arm pits.
The next two hands go for her ribs and hips.
After that the next set of hands begins to tickle her knees.
And then finally the last two arms go for the feet.

Becky immediately explodes with laughter. You can see her trying to break free from the restraints with all her might, but it's no use.
"BWAAHAHAHA that's too much Kevin, hehehehahaha make it stop!"
It seems that Becky is already regretting her decision, but it's too late.

"Sorry Becky, I'd hate to break my promise so soon" you say while taking a seat next too the bed.
"This is unbearable haaahahahaha. Please"
"No, I couldn't look into your eyes anymore"
"I'll forgive youhouhouhou, just make it stohohohop!"
"That's what you're saying now, but you are compromised right now, your words can't be trusted in this state"

You are having a love/hate relationship with this situation.
On one hand, it's not easy to look at Becky suffering like this, especially because you have been on the receiving end yourself.
On the other hand you are enjoying the scene, after all who wouldn't. Besides this is what Becky wanted in the first place.

The tickling continues with Becky pleading to be released, but you simply ignore her. After all, this is what you would to to Laura, if you had the chance. As time moves on, Becky clearly looses energy as she isn't able fight the restraints with her full might anymore. Soon she almost stops squirming and simply lays on the bed as the arms tickle her crazy. For more than half an hour the spell keeps tickling Becky until it finally starts wearing off. One after another the magic-arms disappear, until only Becky remains, clearly exhausted from the punishment.

"I did it. I survived it", she says, still breathing heavily.
"I knew you would, you are tougher than you think."
"I'm just glad that it's over"
"Over? You've got to be kidding. This is just the tip of the iceberg. The night is still young you know"

Becky's eyes open widely, she surely is shocked by this statement.
Squirming and begging she tries to persuade you to release her, but it's no use, because now it's time for
122212.title: By casting a tickle spell

choices: The Mummification and Phantom-Hand multi spell
1222122.content:
Only a short moment passes until you have successfully summoned the ball-lightning. Slowly it floats towards Becky's body, shooting a lightning bolt at her.
Becky shrieks, but not in pain. The ball-lightning only shares the name with the natural equivalent. But this ball is neither hot, nor causes pain.

The bolts travel through the body, stimulating the nerves along it's way, to cause sudden burst of tickling sensations.
This magic spell works almost completely inverse to the last one.
It's not some kind of heavy tickle punishment, not even constant tickle punishment as there are breaks between the bolts.
It also doesn't drain the endurance as much and it's not depending on the victim's weak spots.

But the randomness and the speed of this spell are the criteria that define it the most and make it so special.
The victim never knows when he/she will be tickled, but when it starts, it happens within an instant and there is nothing you can do about it.
Since the bolt enters the body, there is no way to protect your weak spots by covering them, not without rubber clothes or magic that is.

Becky keeps shrieking as the bolts travel through her body. During breaks she is still trying to persuade you to release her, but no, you two are not finished yet.
What Becky doesn't realize yet is, that she is in fact slowly regaining her stamina since she isn't tickled constantly.
This is a fact that will make the next view hours so much more enjoyable, at least from your point of view.

After several minutes you decide it's actually time for phase two of the ball-lightning spell.
With one move of your hand, the ball splits into countless smaller balls, which attach to all different parts of Becky's body.
Afterwards they start sending electric impulses between each other. These impulses are not as strong as before, but now the whole body is affected at once, almost at the same time. It's more like some kind of teasing than actual tickling, but since the pattern of the impulses changes constantly an the pattern is still completely random it's quite unbearable.

"Ihihihihi Kehehehevin stohohohop this. Nohohoho mohohore lightning!", Becky pleads.
The effect of the spell is almost over anyways, but there is not way to cancel the effect of the spell now.
"Sorry Becky, there is nothing I can do about this", you answer with a little bit too much joy in your voice.

It seems that Becky has reaches her mental limit. She starts mumbling some magic spell, but since she is laughing while doing so, you know that she completely blew it.
"Are you sure you want to do this? You know, what happened the last time you tried casting a spell"
"Ignoring your warnings, Becky continues with the spell while giggling and shrieking"

You recognize the type of the spell, normally it's meant for teleportation, but Becky made so many mistakes, she completely changed the type of the spell. Also she made so many mistakes, it's going to backfire at her for sure.

"Don't tell me I didn't warn you", you say while going a few steps back (you don't want to be caught in the effect afterall.)
Meanwhile Becky has finished her spell and like you predicted it completely backfires, hitting her own body.
Only after the effect is over you recognize what Becky has actually done and what trouble she has actually gotten herself into ...
1222122.title: The ball-lightning

choices: The two of you share a kiss
12221222.content:
Becky has actually cast the Iron Maiden Spell on herself.
The Iron Maiden spell wraps around it's victim's body. From the outside it looks like an iron maiden (thus the name), but from the inside it's completely hollow.
Still the iron maiden is so tight, it completely removes all mobility from the victim.

Since you can still hear Becky's laughter from inside, it seems that the ball-lightning hasn't completely vanished yet.
"This time you've really done it Becky", you say
"You've gotten yourself into trouble again. I really was feeling sorry for you, you know. I almost wanted to release you."

You walk towards your desk and grab your tool box.

"But like you and Miss Galacia said, you have to face the consequences of your actions. I'm afraid you leave me no choice but to take advantage of the iron maiden now"
Becky, who is still laughing isn't responding (you most likely couldn't clearly understand her from the inside anyway)
Currently Becky is still being teased by the ball-lightning spell, but the true purpose of the Iron-Maiden spell is completely different.

It removes the mobility of the opponent and wraps around the whole body, except for the the soles, which are without any protection. The poor victim can not even move it's toes and has to endure whatever it's tormentor is going to do with them.
You take a feather from the toolbox and slowly start tickling the right foot.

"Becky immediately reacts to this by laughing louder than before."

You take a seat in front of Becky's feet, draw a second feather and start to use both of them at the same time.
Becky is laughing and pleading inside the iron maiden, but outside don't understand a single word she is yelling.
The tool box actually contains lots of useful toys: brushes, feathers and gloves of all kind and you are going to use all of them.

After a little while the laughter stops whenever you are granting Becky a short break, which means the ball-lightning is gone by now.
For minutes you keep stroking the soles, moving from arch to and inbetween the toes, using every special trick you learned over the years.

And after what must have felt like an eternity for Becky, you decide that it's time to come to an end too (since the iron maiden also won't be there forever anyways).
In the final stage you start using your own hands and even your tongue, which seems to drive Becky mad. The words have long stopped and all that you can hear by now is frenzied laughter from the inside of the iron maiden.

Ten more minutes pass and the effect of the Iron-Maiden spell finally wears off.
Becky remains tied on the bed, without any energy left. Her hair is a mess and her body is covered in sweat.
You unlock all of her restraints but Becky still doesn't move right away.

Several minutes pass with neither of you saying a word, nor moving.
Then Becky breaks the silence.

"I can't believe what just happened. You can be quite cruel you know"
"Are you mad at me?"
"No, I came to you after all. But I can't believe you had this sadistic side in you". She smiles saying those words, while covering part of her face with one of her hands.
"You shouldn't have mentioned Laura"
"I guess not. Just give me a minute to regain my strength"

You move to the desk to get the watch and show it to Laura
"Almost 2 hours?"
"I told you, you are stronger than you think"
"Wow Unbelievable."

After a little while Becky stand up and starts getting dressed again.
"I guess, I have to call in sick tomorrow, there's no way I'm going to school like this. Not in a view hours", she says while smiling at you.

Before she finally leaves you call her name again.
"Becky, wait. Since you had the courage to come here today I just have to tell you something too."
"What is it?", she answers with an astonished face.
"You know, I have to admit something"
"Yea?"
"I kinda wasn't THAT selfless during the tournament you know."
"hm?"
"You know I didn't want to ask you before, because I didn't want to take advantage of the situation, but know since you are standing here in front of me now"
"I'm not exactly sure what you are talking about"
"Well, I wasn't able to punish you in front of everybody like that, because I kind of have a crush on you. So would you like to go out with me or something?"
"Oh"
"I mean you don't have to. Like I said I didn't want to take advantage of the situation. I just..."

Becky listens to your stupid, embarrassing mumbling for a while and then ...
12221222.title: Iron Maiden spell

choices: Help cheer up a "poor, sick friend".
122212222.content:
Closing the gap between you swiftly, Becky tilts her head up to brush her lips against yours. Your entire body goes rigid, frozen in shock. Hesitantly, hands shaking, you grip Becky by the hips, pulling her closer. When she doesn't protest, you slip your hands the rest of the way around her, encircling her waist and hugging her tight to your body. In response, she reaches up with both hands, rubbing them over your chest and shoulders, caressing them.

The kiss is as light and fleeting as it is shocking and you stand in stunned silence as she pulls away after several long, wonderful moments. You gulp, feeling flushed and a little confused. You're still holding her by the hips, her skin feeling warm and wonderfully soft under your palms. You're struck by the sudden urge to tickle her but after the night you've just put her through, you're not sure it's a good idea to push your luck.

Becky smiles wanly, her own cheeks stained with colour. She lets out a tiny giggle, covering her mouth with one hand.You grin back stupidly, caught between a storm of disbelief and abject elation. Your mind is churning and your pulse a white-water torrent pounding through your veins. Your knees feel weak and for a moment you're not sure which of you is holding the other up.

Out of nowhere, Becky jabs you in the side, fingers spidering along your ribs in a quick, darting tickle. You dance back quickly, out of her reach, letting loose a yelping string of giggles. "H...hey! What was THAT for?" you demand, shocked. Becky flashes you a sly, teasing grin, wagging one finger at you chidingly.

"That was for taking so long to ask me out. Honestly, Kevin, I was beginning to think you'd NEVER find the nerve."

Your jaw drops. Staring at her silently, eyes popping half out of your skull, it's a few moments before you can manage to find your voice again. "You...you knew that I liked you?"
"Of course I knew," Becky replied, rolling her eyes. "No offence Keven but you're not the most subtle guy in school. I've noticed the way you steal glances at me whenever we see each other. And the way you get kind of shy and nervous when we're studying together. I..." her voice breaks and her face turns red again. "I wasn't TOTALLY sure, or course. I mean, you DO kind of have a reputation as a pervert." Well THAT stung. "But after what happened during the tournament and how you forfeited the match just to help me I...I kind of put it all together."
"I...um...oh." You stammer weakly, unable to think of anything more intelligent.
"So yes," she said, continuing. "I think I would like to go out with you. Or something," she added with a mischievous wink.
Turning away, she padded back to the door. She paused on the threshold, giving you a parting glance over her shoulder. "See you later Kevin. I'm looking forward to our next study session together. I still need a lot of practise if I'm ever going to be as good as Laura. And you're not that bad of a teacher. Bye."

The door shut quietly and for a long, long time you could only stand there, staring at it blankly. Then, the full weight of what had happened struck you, all at once. You'd asked Becky out. You'd asked her out and she'd said yes! She kissed you and said yes! Did that mean she wanted to be your girlfriend? It didn't matter; she'd kissed you and said yes and she liked you too and she wanted to go out and she kissed you and she wanted to study together more and she liked you and...

You let out a tiny, laughing whoop of joy, jumping up and down and pumping your hands in the air. You look like a complete idiot but you don't care. You like Becky and she likes you back! You'd taken a gamble and struck Jackpot! Becky was by far one of the sweetest and nicest girls in school (not to mention one of the cutest). Granted, she was almost as inept at tickling magic as you were but hey, that just meant plenty of opportunities to practise together.

You're so excited about this amazingly wonderful turn of events that you're not sure what to do now. There's no way you were going to be able to sleep now and even if you could, classes were scheduled to start in only a few hours.
122212222.title: Happy days and jubilation!

choices: One of you tries to flank her
You both bull rush her at the same time
12222.content:
You decide to take the win even though it means Becky's torture, after all, she did it to her self. You go to your corner and sit down while the pole continues to torment her bare feet, nipples, armpits and knees. She starts to beg and babble incoherently, you feel so sorry for her but wins aren't easy to come by and you're going to take this one.

She continues babbling "ohplez!... isubmit!... igive!...." for a few minutes before finally she can't take anymore and passes out. the magical hands of the animated poll continue working her feet, knees, pits and nipples and the poor girl is moaning and giggling in her sleep. Fortunately for her passing out ends the match and Kelly casts a cancelation spell. Becky is left in a heap in the corner of the ring and you are declared the winner.

As you exit the ring Laura looks at you disapprovingly.

"Wanna try battling a girl who doesn't tickle her 'self' into submission?" she says bluntly

You refuse to let her diminish your win and refuse.

"you're a little chicken that's why, I'll even let you have a partner, 2 against one, can you handle that?"

you stop in your tracks. 2 against one? what a perfect way to rub it in Laura's face.

"Come here Brian" Laura yells to another recruit, you recognize him, the two of you have been partners before, but only in labs and the like, you've never fought a match together.

"Okay fine" you say. "If you want 2 to 1 odds who am I to refuse?

Laura just laughs. "I should tie one hand behind my back just to make it fair", she says and enters the ring as Becky is being carried out.

You and your partner go over some strategy and the match begins.
12222.title: Don't help her

122221.content:
You circle around Laura while Brian goes face to face.

1311.content:
You crawl into the caverns, soaked with sweat as the sun blazes behind you. You slough off your heavy pants and shirt and socks as a breeze from deeper within the caves coolly caresses your body.

As you sigh with relief you hear the soft murmur of falling water further in the cavern. Your parched mouth drives you on without a second thought.

You slurp hungrily at a cistern of cool, clear water in the heart of the cave. "Drink deep and prepare for your test!" hisses a sultry, feminine voice from behind you.

You spin around and see a beautiful woman with glowing, violet eyes and shimmering red skin. She is clad in a black, incandescent bikini and moves with the cruelty and cunning of a serpent.

13111.content:
"I'm sorry, matron!" You stammer, wiping the cool water from your lips. "I'm not here for a test, I only needed shelter from the sun and some cool water."

The beautiful woman sighs. "Very well."

With adder-speed she raises her arms and spits an incantation! Everything goes dark.

When you come to, you find yourself sitting down with your feet in front of you, clasped in stocks, and your arms manacled over head. A leather gag tightly covers the whole bottom of your face and the desert sun beats down mercilessly. Sweat beads and runs down your nearly-naked body. A sign nearby reads "Please see this sorry excuse for a wizard home safely. Or ..." Near the sign is a barrel filled with feathers of every shape and variety.

You struggle against your bonds as you hear voices in the distance, and see figures emerge over the ridge! It is a couple of senior apprentice girls; one short, with cheek-length, blonde hair in an airy, flowing robe of crimson, the other a tall and muscular girl, with long, black hair, and a sheer white robe. They notice you, go silent, and approach.

"What do we have here?" Asks the girl in red? "A sorry excuse for a wizard?" She remarks, reading the sign.

"And what about these?" Asks the tall girl in white, drawing two long, stiff feathers from the barrel."

You shake your head desperately and plead into your gag. You're in way over your head!

The blond chortles and grabs two feathers from the barrel as well, as they both approach your struggling body.

"Well, little wizard, let's see what my spell of Incredible Sensitivity can really do?" says the blond as she raises her hand in a malevolent gesture!

The words of the spell strike terror in you. Immediately you feel every breath of wind on your body! You begin bucking and screaming before either girl even touches you with a feather.

Laughing maliciously, both of them lay into you; one twirls feathers over your nipples and darts into your arm pits while the other saws between your wriggling toes. Every nerve of your body reacts one-hundred fold; you scream into your gag, writhing and struggling, but the girls only laugh.

In a moment of sheer cruelty, the woman in white yanks your sweat-soaked briefs down to your knees. She drops her feathers and attacks you with both hands; one hand sliding between your legs, toying with your ass, while the other runs its thumb up and down the underside of your shaft. You groan and shout into the gag, your voice growing hoarse. The blonde tortures your nipples and armpits with the flicking feathers as you thrust desperately against your bonds.

You groan and pant, near-climax from the over-stimulation wracking your body when the girl in white quickly pulls her hands away, laughing. Taking the queue, the girl in red drops her feathers, while you shake and quiver, pleading desperately under the blinding desert sun.

"Well that was fun." Says the blonde in red, looking over the desert horizon, completely ignoring you.

"Fun enough," says the dark-haired girl, as you mmmmmpppph and beg "On to our test then?"

"On to our test." Agrees the blonde. You writhe and squeal desperately as both girls continue into the desert.

You buck and groan under the desert sun, covered in sweat, about to burst. Eventually, a less malicious student finds you and, with some humiliating chiding, sends you back to the Material Plane.

You probably aren't meant to be a wizard.

the heat is so unbearable that all you can think is how good the water felt, minus the tickle torture of course. you gaze up at the hot sun as it beats down on your hot, bare skin.

Amazingly you can breath! the water feels just like air, and as the hands work your feet and pits like a pro they start to explore your belly and belly button and you go nuts! You realize to your horror that, although you can breath the water it makes you ten times more ticklish!!!!!

You touch the globe when it turns blue. suddenly the room transforms around you, the walls dissolve into a pure white and you see blue sky. you feel cold and you realize it's snowing. apparently you've been transported to frozen tundra.

You're a little worried about the cold, all you're wearing is a tshirt, shorts and socks. You recall that, in your spell book, you came across a magical phrase that might help in a situation like this and, though you find it a little odd that t tickle spell book would have a clothing spell, you utter the phrase as best you can remember it and a sweater and insulated socks appear on you, they both adjust to counter the cold and you feel perfectly content.

Now that you're guarded against the cold you start to get your barrings. you know that these pocket dimensions were once used to punish criminals, putting them in a universe populated by tickle traps and monsters and the like, but these days they're used to test your magic skills and endurance.

you know that these are designed to expire once a certain condition is met, and that a clue to the end game is usually present at the beginning. you look to your left and right and finally, you spot it... a symbol drawn on the ground partially covered by snow. you kneel down and wipe away the snow until the symbol is all that remains, and you see it. It's a feather.

Now that you know what you're looking for you set off.

132.title: Blue

choices: Free the female giant from the stocks
Return the she-giant to sleep with a spell and get the feather yourself
Wake, and attempt to parlay with the sleeping male giant (GULP!)
1321.content:
You wander for several leagues through howling wind and biting snow. As the gray light darkens, you shiver violently. Feeling leaves your feet, but you trudge on.

Before nightfall drowns the barren landscape in inky darkness, you see what appears to be a massive, iron-bound door set into a jagged outcropping of rock and ice on the horizon. Desperate for any kind of shelter you break into a clumsy, denumbed sprint.

You knock at the towering double doors (no sense being rude), but there is no answer. With the rest of your waning strength you push mightily against the frigid oak and slowly it groans open.

Yawning before you is a tremendous hall! Massive bronze braziers line the ice-carved walls, filling the hall with a dim, but warm, light. You step trepidatiously forward, until the howling of the wind through the crack of the door is a distant whine. But another strange and rumbling sound grows louder and louder.

At the far end of the hall you see an incredible sight! Slumped in a cyclopean wooden throne, thunderingly snoring, is a huge man, well over 20 feet tall! A frost giant! His chain shirt jingles and his bone-white, braided mustache flutters with each exhalation. To his right is a lovely, but equally giant, woman; divested of every shred of clothing she is folded into large wooden floor stocks. Her head pokes through the center with her hands at either side, and her enormous bare feet just below them. Despite her contorted arrangement, she seems to be sleeping just as soundly as the other giant.

You begin to consider the wisdom of coming any closer when the eyes of the woman open suddenly, focusing directly on you!

"Ah, brave magician! You come for the feather," she whispers loudly, with a thick Scandinavian accent.

She motions with her eyes toward the throne and you notice a scintillating golden feather resting on the lap of the sleeping giant. This must be the item you need to escape this pocket dimension.

The she-giant groans and fidgets uncomfortably in the stocks.

"Free Helga from this contraption and I will give you the cursed feather!" She pleads, smiling hopefully.
"Hmmmmm," you think, "cursed?"
1321.title: North

choices: The giant man starts to wake up
13211.content:
You wait for a moment and then nod, showing Helga that you are going to help her. The giant seems to be happy as she continues to smile, waiting for her release.

You move closer to Helga, but releasing her is easier said than done. The stocks are a lot bigger than you and even if you could open them, there is a giant iron lock that prevents you from doing so.

"Do you know where the key for this iron lock is?"
With the little movement she has, Helga uses her index finger to point into a direction. As you turn your head, you see that she is pointing at that giant man, who is wearing the key around his neck on a long, thick chain.

"You've got to be kidding me. Even if I could lift a key like this, it will be impossible to remove it from him, especially if he shouldn't wake up. I mean I shouldn't wake him up, right?"

Helga shakes her head indicating that you shouldn't.

"Thought so. Well what am I going to do then" you think loud.

Then you remember that there is a spell to open locked doors. A little modification of the spell and it could work here as well. But you never were good at modifying spells and not that good at casting them either.
Still what else can you do?

"Let me try something" you say and start to mumble a magic formula.
After you are finished, you point your hand in the direction of the stocks.
A red flash emerges from your fingers and moves to the lock. Afterwards a loud cracking noise can be heard, and then... Nothing happens.

You wait for a moment and then suddenly..
13211.title: Free the female giant from the stocks

1323.content:
Procrastinating, as always ...

You are rubbing your chin thoughtfully when a thick sack is yanked down over you, blinding you and pinning your arms fecklessly to your sides.

What feels like several powerful hands push you onto your side and begin dragging you through the snow.

You struggle pointlessly and a number of strange voices belch a nonsensical language outside of the bag. The cold, howling wind recedes and you aren't sure, but you think you're being taken underground

Hours pass.

Eventually you are dumped onto a frigid, ice-carved platform. A multitude of small, pale creatures with bulging eyes stretch your arms above your head and slap your wrists into a pair of icy manacles. Your shoes are hastily removed and your feet are locked into translucent, shimmering stocks.

To your left is a woman seemingly your age; her skin is almost totally black, her hair white, her eyes red. She wears nothing but a green, lacy thong, and appears to be hyperventilating at the moment. To your left is a more masculine, boyish creature with lidless, black eyes, and shimmering, short-cropped tourmaline hair, similarly clothed.

While the diminutive ice creatures strip you to your underwear, chanting some weird, nasally incantation, the black woman speaks to you mentally:

"You have failed the Overcoven too. Now the Desolate will take your life force."

As she hangs her head in resignation, the little snow creatures swarm the boything to your left, tickling hungrily at his feet and underarms.

He screams, strangely sonorously, as more and more of the pale snow-creatures swarm over him, tearing his underwear away and tickling every inch of his helpless body.

You can barely make out a faint, vermilion vapor streaming out of his body and into the horde of icy tickle monsters sieging him.

The woman to your right closes her eyes and begins chanting an alien language as the ice-creatures tickle hungrily at the naked, convulsing prisoner to your left. You shudder in terrified anticipation.

Obviously this is some horrible punishment dimension and if you don't do something soon you'll likely be tickled to death!

You can only recall two spells, however; Yulgoth's Ecstatic Incapacitance, which should render everyone within 30 feet happily unconscious. And Prolmeth's Beneficent Teleportation, which should translocate you approximately 10 miles from your present location.

The reddish vapor floating out of the creature to your right begins to wain as the horde of snow-beasts relentlessly tickle his delicate feet, smooth underarms and helplessmidsection The creatures hungrily turn their gaze to you!
1323.title: You're ambushed before you can decide
