You touch the globe when it turns green. The room around you dissolves around you and under your feet there appears grass, the walls dissolve into trees and you see blue sky. You've been transported to some kind of forest. You know that these pocket dimensions were once used to punish criminals, putting them in a universe populated by tickle traps and monsters and the like, but these days they're used to test your magic skills and endurance.

You have to decide which direction to travel
133.title: Green

choices: Take care of the five brutes with some heroic magic
Follow the barbarians and their captives to learn more
Head back into the forest, away from whatever is going on here!
1332.content:
You head south, through insufferably thick brush and overgrown, tangled thickets. You think about turning around when you catch the unmistakable whiff of campfire. You creep cautiously in that direction and soon make out the sound of a woman's laughter!

You draw closer to the laughter, which is loud and relentless, and soon hear a number of deeper, baritone murmurings under the cacophony of breathless, screaming laughing. You draw back a thick-leaved branch and discover a campsite.

The deep voices belong to several hulking, barbaric-looking men wearing breechcloths, ruddy body paint, and little else! One or two sit lazily around the crackling fire, sharpening strangely exotic weapons, but three of the stooped beasts are gathered around a pair of sturdy poles, hung horizontally between the crotches of trees. Dangling from the poles are a man and woman, bound at their wrists and ankles, bowed uncomfortably toward the forest floor, wearing only tight green shorts and a slight, green tanktop for the woman.

The relentless laughter is coming from the woman, a dark-skinned beauty, with short black hair and strong Mesoamerican features. She is screaming and bucking wildly while two of the encircled barbarians poke happily at the girl's vulnerable underarms and frantically wriggling feet.

"Hahahahahaha-N-n-n-n-noooo M-mwhahahaha-m-more! P-plahaha! Nooo! P-Please! Ahahaha!" She screams, near the point of delirium.

The male, a lanky, pale blond, stares unflinchingly at the ground.

The girl seems on the verge of total exhaustion as the largest of the savages concentrates his tickling attack between the tops of her thighs. She shouts and begs for mercy between breathless bouts of insane laughter.

Now, you think, might be an excellent time for a spell!

Or it might not ...
1332.title: South

choices: Try, through your gag, to convince the barbarians to let you go
13321.content:
What's the point of being a fantastical magician if you can't save a pretty girl now and again?

Gathering your thoughts, and courage, you mentally review a simple sleep spell. Once you're sure you've got it right, you step confidently into the camp and raise your arms.

The tickle torture of the young woman ceases and all eyes are on you.

You perfectly recite Zllumbr's Deinvigorating Nap and gesticulate flawlessly in the direction of the dumbfounded barbarians and ... nothing happens!

A few of the brutes snicker and you're pretty sure you heard the captive blond call you an idiot under his breath. Your mind is racing; what could have gone wrong?! You mentally recalculate all the intricacies of the spell but before you can attempt to cast again you feel a powerful pair of hands on your shoulders and another pair grasping your wrists!

"Looks like another from that camp," growls the muscly barbarian, gripping your shoulders.

"Chief Grurtr is going to run out of room in his trophy room," rumbles the other, as he roughly binds yours wrists with thick hempen rope.

"He'll just build another!" Shouts one of the brutes surrounding the exhausted female captive.

You feel more rope being wrapped around your ankles by a third barbarian. Time to think fast!

You begin to recite the Stupifying Chromatic Fog! It takes a while to cast, but it doesn't require your hands and it never fails! But about halfway through the lengthy recitation the barbarian that had bound your wrists scowls with annoyance and effortlessly rips your shirt clean off! Without missing a beat, he begins stuffing the tattered clothing into your mouth, reducing the rest of the spell to surprised muffles. Once your mouth is filled with shirt, the chuckling barbarian begins winding rope around your jaw.

"Ha! What's the matter Gorf? Afraid this powerful wizard was going to overcome the anti-magic field?" Asks the barbarian at your shoulders.

"Pfft. Just tired of hearing him talk," scoffed Gorf as he firmly knotted the gag in place.

Anti-magic field?!?! You wonder, eyes wide.

"Fetch another pole," shouts the ruffian behind you as the barbarian at your feet cinches your ankle bindings. "Put this fool over there with his friends. We'll leave for home at nightfall!"

As the beast-man Gorf shambles into the forest to retrieve a pole to bind you to, you notice the barbarian who tied your ankles has wandered over to the campfire and the leader who'd held your shoulders has turned his back on you and is walking toward the forest. There's an incredibly minute chance you could escape!
13321.title: Take care of the five brutes with some heroic m...

choices: A seemingly helpful ram necromancer and his centaur servant
Feared Earth, Water, Fire, and Air mages
133212.content:
My magic may be incapacitated, but if I can get my mouth free, I'll be able to try to talk our way out of this.

It sounds like a good plan, but executing it will be tough. The apparent leader is already out of earshot and Gorf is busy getting a pole so your best bet appears to be the one back at the campfire. You start to wiggle about, grunting into your shirt that gagged you. "Hmph! Hmph!" He doesn't turn towards you so you decide to hop closer, which you do. Unfortunately...

...you feel yourself being flipped over, landing on your back with a muffled grunts, feeling a bit of pain on your bare back. "Gorbag! Why weren't you keeping an eye on this one?!" Gort yells.

"Didn't think he could do much, all trussed up like that!" retorts Gorbag. Grumbling angrily, Gort just sets down the pole and unbinds your hands only to tie them to the pole. Then he picked up the pole, with you tied to it, and used it to bridge the gap between two trees.

You seize the opportunity to get his attention. "Geh thss off mm! M, hfff smmtmm t sss!" You mumble while struggling, thrusting your abdomen in and out.

"Cease and desist!" snaps Gort. He pulls out his flint knife and levels it at your midriff. "Or I'll do worse than tickle you!" You obey, but this doesn't stop him from moving the flint knife to you, forcing you to suck in your belly to avoid a painful sting.

When he let's up, and you let your belly out, you notice some shapes in the distance getting closer and closer.

They are...
133212.title: Try, through your gag, to convince the barbaria...

choices: Maybe it would be better to follow the blond guy for now.
13322.content:
You are about to prepare a simple sleep spell, but for some reason you stop before saying the first word. Somehow you start to feel uneasy about your decision, as if something could go terribly wrong. Maybe the better strategy would be to remain silent and unseen for the moment. You feel sorry for the poor woman, but getting yourself captured won't help her at all.

The barbarians continue to tickle the dark skinned beauty for quite some time, until they finally seem to be satisfied. Well at least satisfied for now. One of the barbarians starts to untie the completely exhausted woman, while the others are talking. You can't quite understand what they are saying, but you can see that the biggest barbarian is giving something to the second biggest one. As you look closer you suddenly realize what it its.

It's a shard of the legendary shadow crystal and quite a big one. The shadow crystal nullifies all magic within a certain radius and this one seems big enough to prevent any magic spell within 50 feet. If you had tried to rescue the two captives, you surely would have made a fool of yourself. What seems to be even worse is that they most likely have more than one shard.

In the meantime both captives have been removed from the poles and their arms and legs have been tied with ropes. It seems that escaping is still no option for those two. The biggest barbarian of the group takes the male captive, the second biggest one takes the female captive and the group leaves.

You wait for one minute and then start to follow them. The plants in this area are making it really easy for you to remain unseen, but they don't cover the big brutes. (Not that they try to cover their tracks anyway)

After about 30 minutes of walking the group stops for a while. The two biggest men start talking again and afterward the barbarians split. Three men along with the male captive go to the northwest, while the others take the female captive to the northeast.

Now you have to decide which party you want to follow.
13322.title: Follow the barbarians and their captives to lea...

choices: It's just one woman, you can take her out.
Waiting seemed to work just fine the last time.
133221.content:
You decide to follow the group with the female prisoner. The group is smaller now, so it's a little bit harder to follow them, since you are still keeping your distance. You don't want to be captured by those tickle crazy barbarians after all. Nonetheless you never lose track of the barbarians and after about half an hour they finally arrive at their destination.

It's some sort of village, primitive, but still impressive. The buildings are made of stone and there are quite a few of them. You can see a big statue in the middle of the village and on top of it, there is a big, dark colored sphere. It must be another dark crystal and this one is big enough to protect the whole village from any magic spell.

The group of barbarians enter the village, but you have to stop here for now, if you want to remain unseen. The men and their captive enter one of the buildings at the border of the village. A moment later the barbarians leave, but it seems they left the dark skinned beauty inside.

For a moment you consider your options. As long as the dark crystal is protecting the village from casting spells, you won't be able to defend yourself properly. But then you realize that there is a loophole. It's impossible to affect anything with magic, that is placed inside the anti-magic-barrier. But you can affect things that are outside, and the effect won't be canceled once it enters the barrier.

You immediately cast an invisibility spell on yourself. It's the only one you know, but it is quite powerful. You will stay invisible until a certain purpose has been fulfilled and right now your purpose is to save the poor captured woman.

Now that you're invisible you move closer to the village and by doing so you start to hear laughter. At first it's silent, but with every step you take towards the stone building with the captured woman, the laughter gets louder and louder. You take a deep breath and enter the building. It seems to be some kind of prison.

You can see about 10 individual cells, with massive stone walls in between. Each cell contains a female prisoner. Some are chained to the wall and some of them have been fastened to the floor, but and all of them share the same fate. They are tickled without mercy by by a big brute.

You move forward, looking into each cell. None of them contain the woman you are looking for, until you finally reach the last cell. So this is where the poor woman has been taken to. There is another person inside the cell, the first female barbarian you have seen so far. Like her male counterparts, she is clad sparingly and parts of her skin have been covered with paint.

The black woman has been placed in a pair of stocks and even her toes have been tied, so her feet have been completely immobilized. Additionally her hands have been tied behind her back. The poor captive is pleading.

"Please not again, I can't take it any more. Please, I'm begging you"

What are you going to do?
133221.title: Follow the beautiful woman.

choices: Maybe you should still wait longer.
1332212.content:
You decide that it's too risky to act for now. If you are captured, everything you have achieved so far will be pointless. Yes waiting it out is the best option right now, even though you feel sorry for the dark skinned woman.

The female captive is still pleading but the barbarian woman simply ignores her. She starts to tickle the soles of her feet with her long fingernails. The poor victim immediately explodes with laughter.

"Nnoooooo waaaahahaha. Staahahahap. No mohohore!"

Even though she had some time to recover, you can see that she is still pretty exhausted. No wonder, hardly one hour has passed since you have left the campfire and who knows how long she had been tickled there.

"Yes, Gorf told me your feet were especially ticklish and would require special treatment. You and I are going to have a lot of fun", the barbarian says, without stopping the torture for even one minute.

Her poor captive keeps screaming for mercy for a while, but soon just her laughter remains. It seems that she doesn't have enough strength left for yelling. Meanwhile you are still invisible and sitting in the corner. You are covering your ears and telling yourself that you are sorry and promising that you will save this poor woman from the tortures soon.

After quite some time the barbarian woman stops the tickling for a moment. The captive seems to be relieved at first, until she realizes that her tormentor is just going to change her strategy. The barbarian woman takes two feathers and starts using them simultaneously on her victim's feet. The poor woman is sent into hysterical laughter once again. Channeling all her remaining power she starts to yell.

"Leeeeaaave my feeeet aaaloooone!"

The barbarian woman simply smiles and continues stroking those big soles, moving between the toes once in a while. The dark skinned beauty keeps laughing and pleading but none of it reaches the deaf ears of her tormentor. She keeps tickling the poor woman for hours without stopping for more than mere seconds. Only when the sun has almost vanished and the night is about to begin she finally stops the torture.

"Let's stop here for a little while", she says. "I will give you some time to recover your strength, this isn't fun if the laughter becomes too silent after all". She laughs for a moment and then continues. "I will return soon and then we will carry on where we left". She starts to leave the cell and before vanishing around the corner she says her final words. "You are going to laugh the whole night" And then she is gone.

The dark skinned beauty on the other hand is still breathing heavily. You can't even imagine how bad this must have been for her.

What are you going to do now?
1332212.title: Waiting seemed to work just fine the last time.

choices: Two versus one? We can take her down.
You don't have to do anything, Aya saves the day.
13322121.content:
After the barbarian woman has left the cell you move to the wall and look around the corner. You wait until she has left the building and then you walk towards the captured victim. As you start to untie her arms, the dark skinned woman starts to get suspicious.

"What is this, is somebody here?", she asks.
"Shhh, don't make too many noises, I'm going to rescue you.", you answer.

You move towards the stocks and start to untie the woman's toes, which seems to tickle her.

"Please be careful, I'm really sensitive now and I can't take much more", she says while trying her best to hold the giggling back.
"I'll try my best", you answer.

You free the remaining toes and open the stocks, the dark skinned beauty finally is free again.

"Wait for a second, I'll check if the coast is clear", you say and look around the corner again. You may be invisible but the black woman is not. You are afraid that someone from the other cells might see her, but soon you realize that all of them are too occupied with either tickling or laughing. "Come on, let's move", you say while taking her arm.

The two of you walk towards the door and before leaving the building you take a look outside. "We are lucky, nobody is watching. Also it's getting pretty dark. If we are careful, we should be able to escape. Let's move out quickly before someone catches us", you say while trying to sound as brave as you can.
Both of you take a deep breath and then you start running as fast as you can. For ten minutes straight you run full speed until your body suddenly becomes visible again.

The purpose of the magic spell has been fulfilled and the effect has worn off. The dark skinned woman stops running and starts talking again.

"Now that I can see you, I can finally thank you properly. Let me first introduce myself, my name is Aya. And you have my eternal gratitude for rescuing me. I wouldn't have been able to stand this torture for even one additional minute."

She moves closer to you and kisses your forehead, when the you are suddenly interrupted by a female voice.

"What the hell do you think where you are going."

Oh no it's that barbarian woman again. She seems to have gone hunting, because she is carrying a rabbit and a deer.

"I don't know how you managed to escape, but you are going to regret this, and your little boyfriend here will be my personal trophy", the barbarian woman says while dropping the hunted animals and preparing for combat. At full speed she starts charging forward.

Yikes, what should you do?
13322121.title: Rescue the capitve woman.

choices: Let's move as far away as possible.
Wasn't there some blond guy captured alongside you?
133221212.content:
Still startled by the recent events you don't know what to do, but Aya starts to speak some magic words. You don't recognize the magic spell, but the barbarian woman suddenly transforms into an exact copy of Aya. You are shocked but not as shocked as the attacker. She has stopped her assault and is looking at her body as if she can't believe her own eyes.

"It seems you have underestimated the reach of the anti magic barrier" Aya says and starts to prepare another spell. You actually recognize this one, it's a powerful sleeping spell. The magic immediately affects the barbarian woman and she falls asleep.

What the hell just happened? It seems Aya realizes your astonishment and starts to explain.

"You know, I am a Shaman, actually a descendant of a special bloodline."
"Okay", you answer, still amazed by the recent events

Aya continues with her explanation. "This is why I have been captured. I have something they want. This is also why they will realize my escape soon and they will start hunting me again. But I have a plan. Can you cast your invisibility spell once more? This time on the three of us"

"Sure, but why on her as well? Shouldn't it be enough to make us invisible", you respond.
"There is a reason I transformed her into a copy of me", Aya says and you finally start to understand.

You cast the invisibility spell on you, Aya and the barbarian woman. Then you and Aya start walking back to the village again. It takes a while, because you have to carry the sleeping woman. Even though she now has the shape of Aya, she is still as heavy as she had always been.
The three of you enter the stone building with the cells and move to the last cell, where Aya had furiously been tickled before.

You help Aya tying the barbarian woman up in the exact same way Aya had been fastened. Immediately after you are finished, the invisibility spell of the barbarian woman fades away while you and Aya stay invisible.

"We aren't finished yet", Aya says and puts a gag into the captive's mouth. "Now she won't be able to tell anybody the truth"
"Any if somebody removes it?"
"I don't think they will believe her anyway"

The barbarian woman starts to wake up and realizes that she can't move her body. She starts to scream for help, but only muffled sounds are coming from her mouth. Aya starts tickling the barbarian's feet, which immediately produces wild laughter.

"How I would love to give you the payback you deserve, but I guess I will just have to imagine your suffering at the hands of your friends", Aya says.
The captured woman screams as loud as she can, but you can't understand what she wants to say.
The noise seems to have alerted one of the barbarians in one of the neighbor cells though.

"What's going on. So eager to laugh again?", he says and even though you can't see him yet, you can hear that he has started to move.
Aya bends down to the captured female and whispers "Now it seems that you are going to laugh the whole night instead of me".

The big brute enters the cell, moves towards the captive and immediately starts feathering her soles, which results in hysterical laughter right away. For a little while you and Aya keep watching the torture of the barbarian woman. But soon you finally leave the stone building and the village. The two of you run through the woods until the invisibility spell wears off again.

"I can't believe we just did that", you say to Aya.
"You know what, me neither", she answers. "I hate that we have to leave all those women, but there is nothing we can do about them for now."
"How long until they will realize that we placed a decoy?"
"The duration of the spell differs, but it will take at least several days", Aya answers with an evil smile.

"I just realized that I never asked for your name".
"I'm Kevin"
"Okay Kevin, what are we going to do now?".

You take a moment to think about the available options and then you start to answer her question.
133221212.title: You don't have to do anything, Aya saves th...

13322122.content:
The captive woman is still breathing heavily from the tickling she just had received. After what you just witnessed, you don't dare to move even an inch. If you get captured now, you would suffer the same fate or even worse. No, you can't risk it, at least not for now.

Some time passes and the barbarian woman returns, this time with a man accompanying her. Without saying a word she starts to continue tickling the victims feet again.The poor woman doesn't take it very well this time. Almost immediately she starts begging and pleading. The short break simply wasn't enough to recover her strength.

Finally she completely snaps, yelling that she will tell them everything, if they just stop the treatment. This must have been what the barbarian woman had been looking for. The torture somewhat lessens, even though it doesn't completely stop. For the next 20 minutes, the captive woman tries her best to correctly spell a list of ingredients, while her soles are still being teased with a feather. Meanwhile the male is writing down every word on a piece of paper.

When she finally has finished talking, the barbarian woman tells him to leave. Completely exhausted the captured woman summons her last strength to speak.
"You have what you wanted. Now let me go, leave me alone finally"

Her captor grins with an evil smile as she starts to target her feet with the feather again.

"You know, it's true that we got what we wanted, but I never said anything about letting you go. I didn't even say anything about stopping the torture or any breaks. I said that you would be going to laugh the whole night though and I'm afraid that I have to keep my promise, otherwise my words wouldn't be worth much anymore, would they?"

Completely shocked by this statement, the dark skinned beauty keeps pleading and begging, but it's useless. The evil woman keeps feathering her soles till the sun rises. But the poor woman's ordeal doesn't stop at this point. Every single night, she has to suffer the worst imaginable forms of tickle torture one can imagine. It takes weeks, listening to all the barbarian's in the village, until you realize what the woman gave to the barbarians during that fateful night.

The ingredients are needed for a magic potion, which cancels all magic spells for about 3 hours on each person, who drinks it. Without the need of shadow crystals, the barbarians used this potion to conquer others. At first rivaling tribes, then other cultures and races. You heard that the magic school was able to defend themselves pretty long, but in the end even they had no chance without the use of magic.

Each day new female prisoners are brought to the village, which grows at an unbelievable speed, while the male prisoners are brought to a village that is located nearby. The captives are used as tickle slaves to satisfy the barbarians desires. Among the ones you recognize are Laura, Becky and Kelly as well as other colleagues and even teachers from the magic school.

And all of that happened, because you were too scared to act at the most important time. Since you didn't rescue the black woman, you never became visible again. Hiding yourself with the magic spell, you manage to survive by stealing from the barbarians. Guilt and fear prevent you from leaving this place. Thus you are doomed to listen to the hysterical laughter of the innocent victims for the rest of your sorry life
13322122.title: Maybe you should still wait longer.

1333.content:
You hear voices off in the distance and carefully approach the direction. You happened to be wearing a T shirt and jeans when you were transported, but you regret being barefoot, however you're grateful for the extra upper body armor considering the tickle traps that might be in a forest setting.

You get as close to the voices as you dare, and you see the source of them. There appears to be, what looks like some kind of training center in the middle of this forest. Monkey bars, and obstacle course, and the like. You see trainees all over the place and doing all kinds of exercises, and they all appear (of course) to be related to tickling!

All of the trainees are barefoot, the guys are shirtless and the girls are in only a bra.

Looking up, you see a kind of wooden plank suspended high in the air, below there appears to be a pit of some kind, and two contestants, both guys, one blond the other with black hair, walk toward each other on the plank. you feel nervous for them, the plank is only about three feet wide. the contestants carefully approach each other, your heart skips a beat as one of them loses his balance and nearly falls, but he recovers and continue toward his opponent, who seems to have better balance, he seems to have a little more experience.

The two meet in the center and begin grappling trying to knock the other into the pit below. You can't see what's in the pit form your vantage point but both of them seem terrified of being thrown in. They lock up, almost like they're doing a test of strength, the black haired guy almost immediately overpowers the blond and he groans at the prospect of falling.

You move to try and see what on earth is in the pit below, but unfortunately this draws the attention of one of the instructors. He sounds some kind of alarm and a crowd of students and instructors rush toward you.

You turn and run, you manage to keep good distance between you and the mob, you're tarting to feel confident about an escape when all of a sudden: WOOSH! A tree vine 'snaps' around your ankle and hoists you up, holding you upside down. You groan, knowing what kind of trap this is and what it does to keep the victim pacified. You have less than a second to regret being barefoot before another bransh comes over and starts tickling your helpless foot.

AHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!!!! you cry

You struggle against the vine and try desperately to reach your ankle, it looks like you're trying to touch your toes upside down and it must look hilarious because as soon as the mob catches up with you they stop and watch you as your poor foot is tortured and you flail around trying to protect yourself from the torture. Eventually you become exhausted and give up. You let your arms go slack over your head and just take it as the branch scribbled up and down your defenseless bare foot.

"Okay okay he's had enough" One of the instructors say, and the vine, mercifully lets you go. Humiliatingly, you let out some aftershock giggles even after your tormentor lets you go.

"Take him to the training grounds, if he's a hostile maybe we can tickle torture some information out of him, if he's friendly, well, we can always use another recruit.

They take you to an office at barracks at the training grounds. A guy and a girl are present they're both wearing the same outfit, you assume it's the standard uniform that these people wear. A white tank top and black shorts. They seem to be barefoot.

Somewhat aggressively,they proceed to remove your shirt

"Hey!" you protest. The girl does a take down and you wind up on your stomach. She straddles your lover back facing your head.

"Now hold your arms up and let us take of your shirt! Don't resist us or you'l be tickled!"

You gasp.
1333.title: You hear voices and travel toward them

13331.content:
You don't like people pushing you around and you're annoyed at the rough way they're treating you. You have every intention of fighting back, but in the back of your mind, you get the sense that these aren't your ordinary ticklers, they seem more confident, professional and highly trained. The more you think about it, the more intimidated you feel about the position you're in.

"Now!" the girl commands

Her bossyness really annoys you! You are all ready to shout your refusal when all of a sudden you feel the guys fingers on your bare feet....

And your arms go right up over your head!

"Okay! Okay!" You whine!

The girl rips your shirt off in one strong motion. Forcefully, she picks you up by your armpits and deposits you in a chair in the middle of the room. The two then proceed to tie you up, your wrists to the arms of the chair and your ankles back behind you to the chair legs so that your soles are pointed up.

The guy walks behind you and you get nervous not being able to see what he's doing. the girl places her fingers on your bare stomach and you wince.

"Now" she says "Tell us where you're from, what you want, and what you're doing here. and don't lie or we'll tickle you for an hour strait!
13331.title: You let them

133311.content:
You crack!

"Please No! I came here through a portal! i'm a tickle magic student! I don't want anything I was just experimenting with a magic item! Plz don't tickle me!"

This all comes out in a desperate run on sentence, almost as one word! The girl smiles a little bit at your helplessness, you're practically begging and apparently she finds that adorable, which makes you go from being annoyed with her to downright hating her!

She lets out a soft laugh

"You know Brandon, I think he's telling the truth, nobody would make that up on the fly and I can tell how scared he is" *she pauses with a grin* "Of This" She softly runs her fingers across your tummy. you've been tickled before, by becky and other students, not to meantion their spells, but it's never been this bad! This girl has talent and it's TORTURE! and what's worse, you can tell she's only playing around! She lazily spiders her fingers on either side of your stomach and draws then tortuously toward your belly button. you THRASH desperately, tears already in your eyes.

NAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!

she actually giggles! BITCH! she just made your shitlist but right now you don't care, you'd beg and plead and kiss her feet to get her to stop! you'd do anything! and again, she's just playing around!!!!

OHPLZ I TOLD YOU EVERYTHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

She grins big! and continues poking and scribbling around your helpless stomach for a minute, pats you on the head and mercifully stops!

you continue giggling like a little girl and hate your self for not being able to stop..

"you know" she says "You're kinda cute"

GRRRRRRR! you reply. she just giggles and you sense that she knows how much you hate her patronizing attitude toward you. But, at least she unties you. She asks your name which you tell her without hesitation.

"Come with me Keven, the director will want to see you".

You obey

You meet the director and a few other instructors. They explain that this is training camp set up to train tickle soldiers against a faction in the jungle called the Alphas. A group of barbarians who live only for combat and conquest. You learn that these alphas possess a magical stasis field that paralyses the victim while at the same time tickling every major tickle spot at once, and that when they capture an enemy, they make a trophy out of them by putting them so that they're trapped in place and tickle tortured indefinitely! they're then displayed in the leaders trophy room.

This is the worst torture you can imagine and you decide that you never want to be captured by the alphas! (Maybe the scenario would never end if you were captured this way!) the thought is too horrible for you to think about .

The Girl, who introduced her self as Rachael, seems to pick up on your anxiety and says: "That's why we train so hard".

The director explains that you've been chosen to be a new recruit, the alphas use anti magic fields in their battles and so you'l need to train heavily in hand to hand tickle combat. He wants to see what you're made of and offers that you can choose an opponent or one can be selected for you.
133311.title: Tell them the truth!

1333111.content:
"I chose Rachael!"

Everybody in the room gasps! They all look at you like you've just made the biggest mistake of your life and all of a sudden, you start to regret your decision! Rachael laughs and says "Oh honey, you're gonna be so fun to play with"

"Grrrrrrrrrr" is your only response.

"Alright" the director says "now that you've chosen your opponent, which event would you like to compete in?
1333111.title: You chose Rachael

choices: You and Rachel's pants tumble into the pit!
Both you and Rachel (and Rachel's pants) fall into the pit
13331111.content:
"The Monkey Bars," you say confidently, narrowing your eyes at Rachel.

She might have better balance than you, but you've got the advantage of male upper body strength! Right?

The crowd stares and chatters as you and Rachel step to the edge of a wide pit over which is suspended a rust-splotched run of monkey bars. Peeking nervously into the chasm you see a roiling mass of spectral, humanoid figures, they stare at both of you hungrily, reaching toward you with sinister, tendril-like fingers.

Rachel notices your worried expression and teases: "Not familiar with Lust Spirits, eh? Don't worry, I'll give you a formal introduction in a moment."

She stretches athletically before diving gracefully out over the pit and effortlessly catching hold of a metal crossbar. She smiles and now you can see her remarkably well-toned arms and lats.

You swallow hard, gather your courage, and inch cautiously toward your opponent, hand over hand, acutely aware of the sea of menacing creatures flailing rapaciously several feet below you.

Rachel comes at you like a flash! In an instant she's hanging inches away from your face as you awkwardly maneuver. Deftly she brings her knees up to her chest and drives her glossy, wiggling toes into your helpless armpits. You turn and buck wildly, as you explode in a torrent of screaming laughter. You never even had a chance. The laugh and beg between fitful gulps of air, but it only seems to encourage Rachel to tickle you harder, her slender toes dance under your chin and up and down your ticklish sides.

Desperate to end the torture you let go of the bar and lunge toward your tormentor.

A cry of astonishment erupts from the crowd when your wild flailing arms lock around Rachel's hips.

"Ahhhh! What the heck are you doing?!" The surprised girl squeals! "Let go, you idiot! You lost!"

Rachel begins undulating and squirming, hopelessly trying to shake herself free but your terror-induced grip is like iron. You stare despairingly down at the sea of lust-maddened phantasms clawing and flicking just inches below your dangling feet.

Mocking giggling grows among the crowd of onlookers as both you and Rachel's shorts begin sliding slowly down her sun-darkened thighs, revealing a blindingly untanned groin and butt, and a well-manicured chevron of dark pubic hair. Rachel gasps and her face flushes cherry red.

Your opponent really starts struggling now while a stream of high-pitched, unmentionably foul curses and threats pour out of her mouth.

You and her pants slide reluctantly over her knees and you suddenly feel the first ghostly fingers poking coldly at your wriggling soles and clenching feet. It's the most insanely ticklish thing you've ever felt and right now it's only a few of them attacking your feet; the pit seems boiling over with hundreds more!

Her grip on the monkey bars slipping with the added weight of your body and very public humiliation, Rachel gathers her strength for one last shuddering attempt to buck you off ...
13331111.title: The monkey bars

choices: You're Pulled Out of The Pit
133311112.content:
The attempt by Rachel to kick you off goes awry as you just about manage to cling on to her legs, the weight from that finally breaking her hold as she lowers her leg, the weight and momentum forcing her to let go of the bars. As both of you howl in horror, you fall into the midst of the Lust-Spirits as the crowd watches on, giving a cheer at seeing you both make the plunge.

Your fall slows the instant you fall among the Lust-Spirits, preventing you from crashing to the bottom. This proves to be a small comfort though as the tickling starts the instant you stop in the middle of the spirits, their ghostly fingers probing your body as they start their torment. You instantly burst into laughter, the spirits themselves not preventing you from breathing or making a sound as you feel the fingers skitter up and down your sides and legs as the torture begins.

It isn't long before they start to slide your clothing off, your shirt and trousers being pulled off as more fingers tease and tickle your exposed flesh. Your screams get even louder as fingers stroke around your nipples, the soft nubs of skin proving to be highly sensitive as they're flicked and teased. Even more tickling goes over your skin, your feet tormented by rapid wriggling of the fingers of the the Lust-Spirits, the ghostly faces looking gleeful as they make you writhe in torment.

The worst is yet to come however when you feel your boxers yanked off your body, leaving you utterly vulnerable and exposed as they descend onto your penis. Already full erect, your cock twitches as it feels the soft teases coming from the Lust-Spirits. Their fingers stroke your erection from the base of your cock to the very tip, just enough to tickle the highly sensitive organ but never enough to push you into an orgasm. The other brutish captive looks on with helpless embarrassment and fear.

As the woman carrying you approaches, she admonishes and shoos the frolicsome torturers away, much to the relief of the tortured.

You are carried through a wide outer ring of huts and dwellings, drawing a crowd of the strangely appareled jungle women, until you come to the center of the village, where a breathtakingly beautiful blonde woman, with strange runic tattoos on her body, reclines in a massive throne of horn and wood before a great bonfire. She is flanked on either side by several scantily clad spearwomen who aren't too hard on the eyes either.

Across the bonfire from the jungle queen a pair of spearwomen hold one of their kind by the shoulders: a slim woman with short, auburn hair, and long, sinuous legs. Statuesque amazons of every variety ring the fire, watching the proceeding intently.

The fiery amazon that captured you, queues up behind the three women opposite the throne and drops you to the ground.

"And where are these transgressors now?" asks the commanding blonde on the throne of horn and wood.

"They escaped, my Empress," replied the amazon between the two spearwomen, hesitantly.

A gasp went up from the assembled crowd, and a savage looking, ebony-skinned woman to the right of the throne hissed through her teeth. The "Empress" merely sighed.

"The outlanders violated our Mother Forest, looked upon our Sacred Grove, and returned to their blasphemous outpost?!" Asked the Empress, increasingly agitated.

"They have powerful magic, Empress!" said the auburn-haired woman, straining in the grip of the spearwomen on either side. "I was preparing to interrogate their leader when a great sleep fell upon me! When I came to, our captives were gone. It won't happen again!"

"No. No it won't," replied the Empress, looking suddenly dour. "This trespass and humiliation has wounded our Jungle and She must be healed."

"Empress, no, I ..." Began the auburn-haired woman, but the Empress cut her off.

"Kyel'ah, you must heal this wound. Take her to the Briar!" Shouted the Empress.

The crowd of amazons cheered and hooted at this while the auburn-haired woman was forcefully dragged out of view, begging and pleading not to be taken to the Briar. As the crowd slowly quiets, your crimson-maned captor carries you toward the bonfire, where the three women stood previously, dropping you again to the ground, amid the rekindled whooping and noise of the assembly.

"Ah, Kass'alt, what have you brought for us?" Asked the Empress, smiling.

"One of the transgressors, Your Greatness. I found him in the forest, someone bound his feet in prodvine." Explained your captor.

"I'm not a transgressor!" You shout, "I'm a student of magic, I was j ..."

At the nod of the ebony enchantress flanking the Empress, your captor stuffs her foot into your mouth, interrupting your explanation and effectively gagging you. You consider biting down, but quickly think better of it. You just sit there, with half an amazon foot in your mouth, humiliated and a little grossed out.

"Hmmmm," said the Empress, pressing her finger to her chin. "A transgressor, but an enemy of our enemies. You have seen their camp, haven't you?"

You nod your head with some difficulty.

"Then you know their ways as well," said the Empress. "That could be valuable to us."

"No Your Highness," shouted the dark woman on her right, "he is a transgressor! He must heal the forest. To the Briar with him!"

At this, many among the barbarian women cheer and holler. Many, but not all. The Empress sits contemplatively a moment.

Being hogtied on the ground with an amazon's foot for a gag is undesirable, but you feel like the Briar, whatever that is, is infinitely less desirable. For an achingly long time you lie there, looking pleadingly to the Empress to have mercy.

The Empress rises and extends her arm toward you and declares ...
1333111221111222.title: Wait and see where this warrioress is taking yo...

choices: The dimension suddenly collapses, returning you safely to your dorm!
You recall some brilliant and helpful spell!
13331112211112221.content:
"Take him to the Briar!" the sultry queen announces, a malevolent smile parting her lips. The crowd of assembled warrior women cheer and hoot bestially.

You groan and roll your eyes. Of course it'd be the Briar! If it weren't for bad luck after all ...

Resigned to your fate you can only hope maybe they'll get you out of this hogtie before the whole Briar thing, your back's starting to ache and you've long ago lost feeling in your fingers and toes.

Roughly your captor withdraws her foot from your mouth. You work your jaw a bit and try to dislodge the motes of dirt and debris from your tongue with a frenzy of spitting.

You are once again hoisted up by the ropes on your wrists and ankles and carried away from the glow of the fire and the clamor of amazons. Carried and deposited into a small earthen hut, one of several lined up in a dark corner of the village. Though it's more of a tiny shed than a hut really. And although the ceiling is rather high you probably couldn't fit more than two people in here at a time without it getting extremely awkward.

That assumption is soon validated when your captor undoes the rope between your wrists and ankles (finally!) and two more strangely arrayed women push into the shelter. Somehow the three of them manage to maneuver you so that you are hanging by your wrists from the ceiling, the tips of your toes just brushing the dirt floor, if you really stretch. Forced into a tiny space with three beautiful women constantly bumping into you and brushing against you with their bodies, you almost forget the incredible amount of danger you're probably in. But the glint of something in one of the woman's hands quickly brings you back to reality!

Fearing the worst, you're almost relieved when she takes the shard of obsidian and cuts only your clothing. Soon you are naked and, much to your embarrassment, very aroused, but none of the women seem to care one way or the other as they go about their machinations.

A thick, syrupy salve is scooped from stone pestles and smeared onto your body in esoteric designs and runes, paying special attention to all of your most ticklish spots. You flinch and giggle and moan, but the women ignore you.

Once finished, they leave the hut and you dangle there confused and humiliated. If this is the Briar, it doesn't seem all that bad. You're dreamily reminiscing about the strange massage you'd just been treated to when a small breeze wafts into the hut and sends you into a ticklish spasm! The light brushing of your toes against the floor causes you to scream with laughter! Awash with terror you realize the mystery salve has somehow made you even more ticklish, absurdly ticklish!

Everything that follows is a delirium of breathless squealing laughter and ticklish agony. The three women return after some time and carry you off into the woods, along a tangled path illuminated by low, dimly burning torches. You arrive at a clearing on the edge of sheer cliff, all around cluttered up with double sets of crudely hewn stone pillars.

Hanging between one of these sets you see through thick tears of laughter, the leggy amazon Kyel'ah, from the Empress' audience, stretched in a taut X, naked and covered in the strange tickle goop, laughing and shuddering in the breeze.

The women tie you to a pair of columns a few feet from Kyel'ah, who is all the while struggling and laughing and begging to be released.

Once restrained the amazons, who previously had been very stoic and mechanical, begin tickling you with animal ferocity. You scream and plead while the women mercilessly tickle your sensitive and exposed armpits, and flick at your tender nipples.

Your red-headed captor drops to her knees and begins raking her nails of your desperately scrunching feet, and poking between your helpless toes. One of the other women starts at your stomach and works slowly down between your legs, variously brushing gently and wiggling with her long, sinister fingers. You're quickly running low on breath and gasping for air between fits of laughter when a faint rustling beyond the cliff face causes your tormentors to stop their assault and spring quickly back down the jungle path toward the village.

You slump in your bonds, relieved and hungrily sucking air, but Kyel'ah is now going ballistic, screaming and writhing in her bondage. And then you see it, rising up just past the cliff, a gargantuan tangle of animate vegetation and ropy tendrils, like the jungle has somehow come alive! As the massive construct draws closer, several of its vines undulating quickly toward the screaming amazon, you see amid the confusion of branches and foliage countless human skeletons!

Cold horror grips your spine as you realize this is the Briar and you are a sacrifice, soon to be tickled to death by a towering tree golem!

Multiple tendrils grab the panicked amazons legs and yank them free of their bindings, shortly more appendages do the same for her arms and she's dragged laughing and screaming toward the violently swirling mass of greenery! Kyel'ah twists and claws at the ground, but it's useless, she's quickly pulled inexorably closer to the monstrosity.

You almost don't notice the tendril moving slowly toward you, until it glances across the top of your foot, sending you into convulsions of hysterical, terrified laughter. More of the ropy vines are snaking toward you when ...
13331112211112221.title: Take him to the Briar!

info.brief_description: You are a sorcerer experimenting with Tickle Magic, emphasis on the word "experimenting"
info.description:
You are a sorcerer who experiments with Tickle Magic, you spend your day dabbling in Tickle spells and occasionally participating in tickle tournaments with other sorcerers.


NOTE: this story is FOR ADULTS ONLY. Nudity, Sex and the like will all be present and are all okay with the exception of a few common sense caveats, no children/aging and that sort of thing. Have fun with this and don't be shy about adding chapters.
